definition: to support/frame/rack/framework/classifier for planes, large vehicles, radios etc

sentences.english: The varnish was used for electroplated shelves of glasses with good performance.
sentences.chinese: 该清漆应用于电镀件眼镜架上时性能良好。

sentences.english: After finish my psychological class, I go to change my spectacle frame into a new one.
sentences.chinese: 学完心理学之后，我去把我眼镜架换成了一副新的。

sentences.english: The oval frames work best on gals with strong jaw or a square face.
sentences.chinese: 椭圆形镜架最适合下巴线条硬朗或是方脸的女孩儿。

sentences.english: C: Yes, I would like to buy glass frames.
May I adjust this frame for you ?
sentences.chinese: 我可以给您调整一下镜架吗？

sentences.english: I want to buy some glass frames for my clients. Can you show me the sample?
sentences.chinese: 我想帮我的客户买些眼镜架。可以给我看看样板吗？

sentences.english: I would like to recommend some metal frames to you.
sentences.chinese: 我很乐意向您介绍一些金属眼镜架。

sentences.english: Learn how to adjust rimless frame ear pieces in this free eyeglass care video.
sentences.chinese: 了解如何调整无框眼镜架在这个自由耳件护理视频。

sentences.english: The frames of my glasses were broken.
CD frame design simple, but not the lack of CD proprietary versions grade.
sentences.chinese: CD镜架设计简洁，但又不缺乏CD专有的野性品位。

sentences.english: What kind of glasses is suitable for you?
sentences.chinese: 什么样的眼镜架适合你？

sentences.english: What kind of frame do you like?
sentences.chinese: 您喜欢什么质料的镜架？

sentences.english: There are three metal materials, which do you like best?
sentences.chinese: 我们有三种金属眼镜架材料，您最喜欢哪种？

sentences.english: Low profile aluminium frame , high quality surgical silicon eliminate stress mark on face.
sentences.chinese: 使用铝质镜架，高等矽胶，脸上不会留下印记。

sentences.english: What frame materials do you like?
sentences.chinese: 您喜欢什么材料的眼镜架？

sentences.english: Some have flexible resin frames that wrap around the side of your head.
sentences.chinese: 有些具有有韧度的树脂眼镜架，可以围绕在头部侧面。

definition: to have a pair of prescription glasses made
to put on/to wear (mouthguard, contact lenses, hearing aid etc)
cosmetic contact lens/big eye contact lens/circle contact lens
